404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.subtext_html: 404 is the html code for a broken link. It's also the area code for Atlanta, the birth place of famed rapper Ludacris and coiner of the line "Hey DJ, bring that back!". As in, bring back a working website. We got you, fam.

login.title: Login
login.create_benefits_html:
Membership Benefits:
- Save your billing and shipping info for faster easier checkout.
- Signup for emails and get insider info on the latest news.
- Archive your purchases for easier returns and re-orders.

password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.lower: Password must contain at least one lower case letter
password.upper: Password must contain at least one upper case letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*)
password.requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character

gdpr_modal.modal_text_html: Hi! We use cookies on this website to help operate our site and for analytics purposes. For more on how we use cookies and your cookie choices, go here! By continuing to use our services, you are giving us your consent to use cookies.

product.returns_popup_copy: We are Customer Obsessed and make any return simple and quick
product.secure_popup_copy: Our orders are encrypted with SSL, provided level 3 PCI compliance and do not store any credit card data.

qrx.learn_more_copy_html: To be able to swap out our PopTop, you need to have a Complete Swappable PopGrip to start. Once you have a Complete Swappable PopGrip, you can choose to buy a Swappable PopTop and swap as much as you like!
qrx.initial_warn_copy_html: You chose Swappable PopTop, which only works if you already own a Complete Swappable PopGrip. Do you want to continue with just the PopTop?

product_sections.product_adapter_more_text: The anti-fingerprint coating on the back of these devices affects the PopSockets grip's ability to stick. Luckily, we have a simple fix to make sure your PopSocket does its job.

banner.title: Promote with PopSockets
banner.content_html: Looking for a way to promote your business? We got you. A PopSockets grip is a powerful – and fun – way to get your message out there over and over (and over) again. Because, like that one rapper said, "It's all about the impressions."

introduction.title: Why PopSockets
introduction.content_html:
When it comes to branding, we'd argue that nothing could compete with the backside of a device. Here's why: the average person engages in 8000+ public phone calls and text messages a year. That's a lot of impressions. In fact, it's more impressions than the SuperBowl delivers. And way less millions of dollars. Win – win.

Watch the video below to see a PopSocket in action.

get_quote.title: Get a quote
get_quote.content_html: Take a minute to send us some details on what you're looking for. We'll get back to you fast. Like, fast fast.

faq.shipping_question1: Can I resell my promotional PopSockets grips order?
faq.shipping_answer1: Promotional PopSockets grips are to be used exclusively as giveaways; only authorized vendors are permitted to resell PopSockets grips. If you're interested in reselling PopSockets grips, please contact sales@popsockets.com.
faq.shipping_question2: Where are PopSockets grips manufactured and printed?
faq.shipping_answer2: The individual PopSockets grips pieces are manufactured in China. Your custom logo will be printed at the PopSockets production facility in Boulder, CO.
faq.shipping_question3: How long will It take to get my order?
faq.shipping_answer3: It will take approximately 2 weeks from the time the order is placed to when it is delivered.
faq.shipping_answer4: Ground shipping within the US is free.
faq.shipping_answer5: Yes we do. Prices do not include shipping or import fees.
faq.shipping_question6: Can I order less than 100 units?
faq.shipping_answer6: No. We have a strict minimum order of 100 pieces.
faq.other_question1: What are your payment terms for domestic orders?
faq.other_answer1: Your order will be invoiced to you at the time of shipment, at which time full payment is expected. We prefer check or bank transfer, but we also accept Visa, MasterCard, and American Express.
faq.other_question2: What are your payment terms for international orders?
faq.other_answer2: Payment is due in full before time of shipment.
faq.other_question3: Will my customers like PopSockets grips?
faq.other_answer3: Is the sky blue? Yes, the odds are high that your customers will love PopSockets grips -- a typical comment from our customers after using PopSockets grips for a couple days is, "I'll never go back to using my phone without a PopSockets grip."
faq.other_question4: I am an ASI/PPAI distributor for promotional products. Do I get special pricing?
faq.other_answer4: iClick is the exclusive supplier to distributors in this industry. Contact sales@iclick.com for more info.
faq.other_question5: What color options can I choose from?
faq.other_answer5: Standard production uses an off-white button, or a black button. The accordion and platform can be either white or black. Orders of 10,000+ units may qualify for additional customization.
